list.description:
Sights for IS-3, IS-4M, IS-6 for simulator battles.

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change colour for the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

If you would like to know how sim sights work, visit this:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/971966/en/

#t723b3 #t80bvm #essa #ussr #ussr_tank #t54 #t55 #t62 #t64 #t72 #t80 #t90 #bmp #bmp_1 #bmp_2 #bmp_3 #pt76 #sight #universal #historical #tpn

Remaking, 2024.9.9

I made two kinds of historical sights which are the USSR armored vehicles in Cold
War. They are easy to understand.
这两种瞄具是本人制作的苏联冷战装甲车辆历史瞄具。简单易懂。

tpn_universal_sight.blk - the TPN series night gunner sights for all the USSR
armored vehicles equipped with infrared night vision systems.
“tpn_universal_sight.blk”是苏联 TPN 系列夜间炮镜，适用于苏联所有装备红外夜视
仪的战车。

essa_universal_sight - the ESSA thermal imaging system equip...

Simple Allpurpose Sight
This is not strictly general purpose as it was made for myself (for Swedish tanks).
It can also be used for tanks in other countries.
You can change the size, color, etc. of the scale by editing the blk file.

【TSxxx】
TS・・・TakenoSight
xxx・・・Modelname

【lineup】
TST_250・・・250m Distance tank gun sight
TST_500・・・500m Distance tank gun sight
TST_50・・・50m Distance tank gun (howitzer) sight
TSR・・・rocket sight ※U-SH 405
TSM・・・missile sight
TSAA・・・AA sight
TSAA_R・・・radarAA sight

Sight for Leopard 2 PL for simulator battles. With a simple trajectory for APFSDS (both DM33 and DM43) up to 500 meters.

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change colour for the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

...

Realistic sight Jungner OPS 1 for STRV 103 (0, A and C).

You can use with standard view or gunner's view. Use telemetry in gunner's view for compensate the parralaxe.

Contains folder and fil for:
-STRV 103-0
-STRV 103 A
-STRV 103C

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/installer-un-viseur-personalise/3448

#sight #realistic #strv #strv103

#help I was updating my sights for my leo's when I noticed that the HE-VT DM11 on the #leopard2pl #leopard shell was broken. I tried to fix it but it seems that the HE-VT shell type is not specified in the article https://wiki.warthunder.com/index.php?title=User-made_sighting_reticles and if anybody knows this it would be great thank you!

Universal fictional modern sight with X crosshair built for modern tanks and SPAAs. Best working for M1128.


#sight
A sight for the M1128 "Stryker" MGS. There are minute of angle marks at 4, 8, and 12.

Sight for M36 GMC, (Chinese) M36 and Super Hellcat for simulator battles. Features APCBC.

All my sim sights can be found here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

See more sim sights (and how to use them) there:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/971966/en/

...

Версия прицела, содержащая все виды снарядов, поддерживаемых самой техников. Данный пак поддерживает: КВ-1 (Л-11), КВ-1 (ЗИС-5), КВ-1С, Т-34 (1940) или по-другому Т-34 (1941 Л-11), Т-34 (1941), Т-34 (1942), Т-34 (СТЗ), Т-34Э, КВ-220, СУ-76М. Надеюсь, вам понравится. Приятного пользования!
#sight
#historical
#ussr_t_34_1940_l_11
#ussr_t_34_1941
#ussr_t_34_1942
#ussr_t_34e_stz
#ussr_kv_1_l_11
#ussr_kv_1_zis_5
#ussr_kv_1s
#ussr_t_34e
#ussr_su_76m_1943
#ussr_kv_220

#help I am currently trying to make a sight for the #t54e1, however, the APBC shell type is non-functional or some information on the stat card for the shell is incorrect. I have tried bulletType:t= "apbc_tank, ap_large_caliber_tank", "apc_tank, apcbc_tank", and "ap_tank" @ speed:r= 1067 but none work. If anybody knows please let me know :)

Добрейшего вечерочка! Реалистичные прицелы для техники Т-34-85 (Д-5Т), КВ-85, СУ-85 вас уже ждут. Позже список обновится. Ну а пока вот.
#sight
#historical
#ussr_t_34_85_d_5t
#ussr_su_85_1943
#ussr_kv_85

Добрейшего времени суток Давно хотел сделать этот прицел, хотя особого смысла в этом не видел, так как его уже кто только не сделал :) Но я как фанат того времени техники и всего такого, был обязан сделать его. В архиве пак прицельных сеток, дабы было быстрее установить, нужно просто перекинуть в корень игры папку их архива "UserSights". Удачи на полях сражений!

Обновлено:

Добавлена надпись "76-М62"

Добавлены три машины, поддерживаемые данный прицел на снаряд М62:
Т20
M18 GMC
M18 "Black Cat"

<block...

Добрый день, вечер, утро, ночь! Прицел был взят из другой игры, другого автора, но я думаю, он не обидется. Прицельная сетка является универсальной для любого вида техники, но для более лучшего и удобного отображения объясняю: первая прицельная сетка "SwedeSight" - для техники с оптикой, подобной Т-34, где прицел заметно приближает. Вторая прицельная сетка "SwedeSight1"- для техники с оптикой, подобной Т-34-85, где прицел почти не изменяется в кратности. Ну, а на этом всё!
Оригинал был взят отсюда: https://wotsite.net/pritsely/12489-pritsel-shvedskij-swedish-dlya-world-of-tanks.html

...
I've found simply replaces A6M zero type98 sight on American n9

#help - if you can inform me on the leopard 2k's roof 20mm, "triggerGroup", "bulletType", and speed as well that'll be very helpful as I do not know.
A rather complex sight for the Leopard series (that I currently have access to). They all work the same (demonstrated on the Leopard I).
Built for all ammunition types, the top dart round is set as the main. Has a distance measurement based on 2.4m of height, deflection lead for 20 and 40 km/h.
inspired by https://live.warthunder.com/post/719836/en/ and I plan to make this work with all the leopards.

#leopard #leopard1 #leoparda1a1 #leopar...

Leopard 2a4 semi realistic sight
레오파르트 2a4 픽션 조준경

#leopard_2a4 #realistic #semi_realistic #historical

For sight for T-72AV (TURMs-T) inspired by https://live.warthunder.com/post/902605/en/
It is built for the 3BM42 shell, however, it can be retrofitted for the others in the .blk file.
IMPORTANT you must set your mouse wheel to sight distance control with a multiplier of 43% or the flying time and penetration will break (Controls/Ground vehicles/Camera control).
#t72avturmst #t72av #t72

Sight for T-72AV (TURMS-T) for simulator battles. With a simple trajectory for APFSDS up to 300 meters.

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change colour for the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

...

Universal Modern Sight version 2.1 - Minimalistic version for IFVs

  • This version is minimalistic version of my UMTS 2.0 (https://live.warthunder.com/post/987161/en/). I designed this to be used on #BMP-2 , but it'll work on any other vehicle as well
  • This is a #fictional #modern and #universal custom tank sight v2.1 made by me. It works on #alltanks , however I recommend you to use it on #ifv and #bmp_2 tanks , as it was designed for them.
  • Zip file contains 2 sights with different default colours - black and orang...

Made by AkulaV
https://www.twitch.tv/akulav_

New version of my sight is available here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1020556/en/

Description
I created this custom universal sight for myself because I hated the stock sight and wanted something simple + high contrast. My twitch viewers started asking me if they can download this sight, so I decided to share it on WT Live. Hope you find the custom sight useful and let me know if you have any feedback!

Custom Sight Features:

  1. Universal sight works with any tank (including SPAA)
  2. High con...

UNIVERSAL MODERN TANK SIGHT version 2.0

  • This version is simplified, looks cleaner, and contains 3 different colour schemes by default (normal black, green, and orange, + white when lit up)
  • This is a #fictional #modern and #universal custom tank sight v2.0 made by me. It works on #alltanks , however I recommend you to use it on #toptier tanks only, as it was designed for them.
  • Zip file contains 3 sights with different default colours - black, green, and orange, but these colours can be easily modified in the fi...

Improved v2.0 here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/987161/en/

  • This is a #fictional #modern and #universal custom tank sight made by me. It works on #alltanks , but I recommend to use it on #toptier tanks only, as it was designed for them.
  • Original colours are orange by default and white when iluminated, but that can be easily modified in the file - you can change it to whatever colours you want.

I hope that you will like it! Enjoy!

Доброго времени суток! Реставрация очередного прицела завершена.

Была обновлены:

  1. Были добавлены цифры к вертикальным рискам по правую сторону.
  2. Сам прицел был немного расширен, дабы цифры не путались с линиями.
  3. Была добавлена вторая прицельная сетка, адаптированая для техники с иной оптикой.



А на этом всё! Удачи в боях!
#universal
#historical
#sight

Доброго вечера! Данная немецкая прицельная сетка подходит для любого вида техники, но может не всегда корректно отображаться. Проблема в том, что данную проблему никак не исправить. Если какая-то прицельная сетка не подойдёт к конкретной технике, то попробуйте другую. В архиве их две.
Был добвлен эффект виньетирования на первый прицел для большей атмосферы. А на сегодня всё! Удачи в сражениях!
#universal
#historical
#sight
